= Create MZTabFile =

  * Create MZTabFile Manually
    # Create an empty MZTabFile
{{{
MZTabFile tabFile = new MZTabFile();
}}}
    # Create a MZTabFile based on [model_metadata Metadata]. Notice: after create the model, system not allow user reset the metadata again!
{{{
Metadata metadata = new Metadata();
......
MZTabFile tabFile = new MZTabFile(metadata);
}}}
